content: Hey Friends! We're trying to gauge the level of interest in a CDS Hooks connectathon track in Jan. We've got a track defined, but are wondering if we'll have sufficient interest to hold the track. If you're planning on attending connectathon 2022 with a focus on CDS Hooks, mind chiming in or pm'ing me? :hearts:
The Da Vinci Burden Reduction track will certainly be testing CDS Hooks stuff with CRD.
thanks, LLoyd! Da Vinci also runs a distinct track. Is there sufficient interest in a CDS Hooks track?
@Vishwasrao Salunkhe - I'm trying to setup the Interopio client to your discovery endpoint and getting a 500 error. Let me know how to proceed.
@Steve Millard - I'm trying to setup the Interopio client to your discovery endpoint and getting a 500 error. Let me know how to proceed.
CDS Hooks track Connectathon report-out is here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vodcjzdS-T3nqlKKuW1GtzpUtmHjIJ7I/edit#heading=h.y7c680y7m3u5
